Name: market for ammonium carbonate | ammonium carbonate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18049/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'ammonium carbonate', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;ammonium carbonate'  is an inorganic substance with a CAS no. : 000506-87-6. It is called 'diazanium;carbonate' under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: CH8N2O3. It is solid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure. The substance is modelled as a pure substance.  There is no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on a consumer level. On industrial sites, the substance is used for the manufacture of products in the following sectors: manufacture of another substance, chemicals

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'ammonium carbonate',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'ammonium carbonate',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
